brainly_data.question: Rain forests clean the air by producing oxygen. Some rain forest plants have healing properties, and can be used as medicine. Rain forests also are known to affect the water cycle and weather. The threat of deforestation , however, means that these important rain forests may disappear. Which statement best describes the main idea of the paragraph? Rain forests determine the weather. Medicine can be found in the rain forest. Rain forests are important for many reasons. Rain forests are disappearing.
brainly_data.subject: Computers and technology

all_answers.text: Medcine can be found in the rain forest
